import {React, useState, useContext} from 'react' import { useAuthContext } from '../../providers/ThemeProvider/AuthProvider' const AuthorizatingWindow = (props) => { const [userlogin, setLogin] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [reppassword, setRepPassword] = useState('') const {login} = useAuthContext() const handleChangeWindow = (window) => { props.handleSetChoicedWindow(window) } const handleInputChange = async (e) => { switch (e.target.name) { case 'login': setLogin(e.target.value) break case 'email': setEmail(e.target.value) break case 'password': setPassword(e.target.value) break case 'reppassword': setRepPassword(e.target.value) break } } const handleLogin = () => { } return(
Регистрация
Логин
Email
Пароль
) } export default AuthorizatingWindow
